MazeObjects

Class Box

  • java.lang.Object
    • MazeObjects.MazeObject
      • MazeObjects.Box

  • public class Box
extends MazeObject
    the class box is used to put the maze object box in the maze. the box used to create walls.

    Like all MazeObjects, it implements a translate method that returns a copy of the maze object moved to a different location, and a very weak equals method that acts as a somewhat more specific version of the instanceof operator.

      Box(float width, float height, float x, float y, float z)
      the object box has an given height and position. when the box is made it gets is faces which are used by the physics to detect collision.
